name: My Father's Dragon
description: Elmer Elevator searches for a captive Dragon on Wild Island and finds much more than he could ever have anticipated.

review.author: carkid-79165
review.heading: Fantastic, magical, real life problems
review.reviewBody: A boy in a struggling household gets in a fight with hit single mother and runs away. He ends up exploring a magical world that transforms his perspective on things. An island that keeps sinking needs the boys help. His struggle to save the island helps him become an adult. A very artistic way of representing the boys real life problems and the benefits he'll receive from his current real life struggles. The visuals are great. I was impressed by this story line. Addresses real life family issues. Very magical and lots of fun. Great messaging and plenty of excitement to keep a young person interested I absolutely recommend watching this with the family.
